thread.title: Frances Bean Cobain Posts a Letter to Dad Kurt on His 50th Birthday
thread.title_full: Frances Bean Cobain Posts a Letter to Dad Kurt on His 50th Birthday

author: Caitlin Hacker
title: Frances Bean Cobain Posts a Letter to Dad Kurt on His 50th Birthday
text:
Frances Bean Cobain Instagram For Kurt February 2017 Frances Bean Cobain Posts a Letter to Dad Kurt on His 50th Birthday February 20, 2017 by Caitlin Hacker 6 Shares 
Monday marked what would have been Kurt Cobain's 50th birthday, and his daughter, Frances Bean, paid tribute to him in a beautiful way. The 24-year-old, who was not even two when her father committed suicide in April 1994, posted a letter she wrote to her dad on Instagram. "Today would have been your 50th birthday," she wrote. "You are loved and you are missed. Thank you for giving me the gift of life. Forever your daughter, Frances Bean Cobain." Beautiful. A post shared by Frances Bean Cobain (@space_witch666) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:01am PST Related:
